lemma JHS_Tr1_3:"\<lbrakk>Group G; 0 < r; 0 < s; compseries G r f; compseries G s g; i \<le> s * r - Suc 0; Suc (rtos r s i) < s * r; Suc i < s * r; i mod s < s - Suc 0; Suc i div s \<le> r - Suc 0; i div s = r - Suc 0\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> Group (Gp G (f r \<diamondop>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> (f (r - Suc 0) \<inter> g (i mod s))) / (f r \<diamondop>\<^bsub>G\<^esub> (f (r - Suc 0) \<inter> g (Suc (i mod s)))))"
